thread.section_title: Finance | Business and Finance News | News.com.au
thread.title: Forbes names Hollywood’s highest-paid actresses

author: Network Writers
title: Forbes names Hollywood’s highest-paid actresses
text:
JENNIFER Lawrence can now claim the title as the highest paid actress in Hollywood, according to Forbes magazine.
The 25-year-old jumped to the top of Forbes ’ annual list after ranking second last year.
The Hunger Games star raked in estimated earnings of $US52 million from June 2014 to June 2015.
Hollywood star ... Jennifer Lawrence in ‘The Hunger Games’. Picture: The Hunger Games/Facebook Source: Supplied
That put her almost $US20 million ahead of Scarlett Johansson, who came in second this year with $US35.5 million.
Third place was taken by Spy star Melissa McCarthy, who earned an estimated $US23 million, followed by Chinese star Bingbing Fan, who earnt $US21 million.
Chinese star Bingbing Fan earnt $US21 million. Picture: Splash News Source: Splash News Australia
Melissa McCarthy is a comedy queen. Picture: Gerardo Mora/Getty Images for HSN Source: Getty Images
Newlywed Jennifer Aniston claimed the fifth position with $US16.5 million, which earned her bragging points against former love rival Angelina Jolie, who was seventh with $US15 million.
Offering something of a buffer between them, Julia Roberts was sixth with $US16 million.
Jennifer Aniston in ‘Cake’. Picture: Supplied Source: Supplied
Angelina Jolie in 'By The Sea'. Picture: Universal Pictures Source: Supplied
Rounding out the top ten were Reese Witherspoon ($US15 million), Anne Hathaway ($US12 million) and Kristen Stewart ($US12 million).
Last year’s top earner, Sandra Bullock could only manage 13th this year with $US8 million, alongside Meryl Streep and Les Miserables’ Amanda Seyfried.
Although these superstars command mega bucks, the Hollywood pay gap is still a problem.
Lawrence’s combined earnings come nowhere close to the estimated $US80 million of Iron Man star Robert Downey Jr, who topped Forbes’ list of the highest-paid male actors.
Move star ... Reese Witherspoon ranked 8th on Forbes’ list. Picture: Ian Gavan/Getty Images Source: Getty Images
FORBES’ HIGHEST-PAID ACTRESSES
Jennifer Lawrence: $US52 million
Scarlett Johansson: $US35 million
Melissa McCarthy: $US23 million
Bingbing Fan: $US21 million
Jennifer Aniston: $US16.5 million
Julia Roberts: $US16 million
Angelina Jolie: $US15 million
Reese Witherspoon: $US15 million
Anne Hathaway: $US12 million
Kristen Stewart: $US12 million
Cameron Diaz: $US11 million
Gwyneth Paltrow: $US9 million
Meryl Streep: $US8 million
Amanda Seyfried: $US8 million
Sandra Bullock: $US8 million
Emma Stone: $US6 million
Mila Kunis: $US6 million
Natalie Portman: $US6 million
